name: Laboratory Escape
description:
A graphic adventure / room escape game when the main goal is to get out from a laboratory where you are accidentally trapped.
To find the solution of the game and to get out from lab you must find some hidden objects and solve different riddles and puzzles.

Collect items, combine them, use them in an original way and use your head. Only in this way you will be able to save your life and blow up the projects of your archenemy.

Lab Escape like all the escape game has many similarities with popular games such as 100 doors, 100 gates, 100 rooms or 100 floors but Lab Escape has a plot more complex and it is much more fun to play.
Good luck and have fun!
Game walkthrough here: http://pentawire.altervista.org/?section=14&pageID=1

The graphics and music in the game are all in the public domain.

NOTE: The full version of the game is the same as free version but the full version is ad-free and no notices appear during the game.
